</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Unassigns existing item and tries to put it into inventory. If there is no space in inventory the item simply disappears. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''unassignItem''' item </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> item: [[String]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>bluforUnit [[unassignItem]] "NVGoggles";
bluforUnit [[removeItem]] "NVGoggles";
opforUnit [[unassignItem]] "NVGoggles_OPFOR";
opforUnit [[removeItem]] "NVGoggles_OPFOR";
independentUnit [[unassignItem]] "NVGoggles_INDEP";
independentUnit [[removeItem]] "NVGoggles_INDEP";</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
